================================================================================
Emojis in variable names
================================================================================

let ⭐️ = "star"
let 🌙 = "moon"
let ☁️☀️☁️ = "clouds and sun"

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(source_file
  (property_declaration
    (value_binding_pattern
      (non_binding_pattern
        (simple_identifier)))
    (line_string_literal
      (line_str_text)))
  (property_declaration
    (value_binding_pattern
      (non_binding_pattern
        (simple_identifier)))
    (line_string_literal
      (line_str_text)))
  (property_declaration
    (value_binding_pattern
      (non_binding_pattern
        (simple_identifier)))
    (line_string_literal
      (line_str_text))))

================================================================================
Multi-codepoint emojis
================================================================================

func 🏃🏼‍♂️() {
}

🏃🏼‍♂️()


func 👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨(🙋🏼‍♂️ 🙋‍♂️: Man, 🙋🏻‍♂️ 🙋‍♂️2: Man) {
}

👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨(🙋🏼‍♂️: a, 🙋🏻‍♂️: b)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(source_file
  (function_declaration
    (simple_identifier)
    (function_body))
  (call_expression
    (simple_identifier)
    (call_suffix
      (value_arguments)))
  (function_declaration
    (simple_identifier)
    (parameter
      (simple_identifier)
      (simple_identifier)
      (user_type
        (type_identifier)))
    (parameter
      (simple_identifier)
      (simple_identifier)
      (user_type
        (type_identifier)))
    (function_body))
  (call_expression
    (simple_identifier)
    (call_suffix
      (value_arguments
        (value_argument
          (simple_identifier)
          (simple_identifier))
        (value_argument
          (simple_identifier)
          (simple_identifier))))))

================================================================================
Emojis with numbers in them
================================================================================

let number4️⃣ = nummber2️⃣ + number2️⃣

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(source_file
  (property_declaration
    (value_binding_pattern
      (non_binding_pattern
        (simple_identifier)))
    (additive_expression
      (simple_identifier)
      (simple_identifier))))
